title: ICLR 2015
summary:
Some ICLR posters that caught my eye:




[larger image]
Very simple to implement idea that gives impressive results. They force two groups of units to be uncorrelated by penalizing their cross covariance. When the first group is also forced to model classes, the second group automatically models the "style". The problem if separating out "style" has been studied for a while, see  Tenenbaum's "
